languages.text: {n}Он через силу втягивает воздух в легкие.{/n} "Я убил человека. Без намерения, без должной на то причины. Какой-то младший офицер обратился ко мне с какой-то глупостью... я сорвался. И позволил силам возобладать над волей. Он даже не успел закричать".

traits.locale_text: {n}Он через силу втягивает воздух в легкие.{/n} "Я убил человека. Без намерения, без должной на то причины. Какой-то младший офицер наткнулся на меня, когда я осматривал коллатеральные коридоры в поисках одной группы еретиков, решивших развести в твоем трюме свой маленький нелепый культ... я сорвался. И позволил силам возобладать над волей. Он даже не успел закричать".

languages.text: {n}He gulps down air with obvious effort.{/n} "I killed someone. It was not planned, and I had no good reason. A junior officer came to me with some idiotic issue... and I snapped. I let the powers get the better of me. He didn't even have time to cry out."
languages.original_text: {n}Он через силу втягивает воздух в легкие.{/n} "Я убил человека. Без намерения, без должной на то причины. Какой-то младший офицер обратился ко мне с какой-то глупостью... я сорвался. И позволил силам возобладать над волей. Он даже не успел закричать".

traits.locale_text: {n}He gulps down air with obvious effort.{/n} "I killed someone. It was not planned, and I had no good reason. A junior officer came to me with some idiotic issue... and I snapped. I let the powers get the better of me. He didn't even have time to cry out."

{n}He gulps down air with obvious effort.{/n} "I killed someone. It was not planned, and I had no good reason. A junior officer came to me with some idiotic issue... and I snapped. I let the powers get the better of me. He didn't even have time to cry out."

{n}He gulps down air with obvious effort.{/n} "I killed someone. It was not planned, and I had no good reason. A junior officer came to me with some idiotic issue... and I snapped. I let the powers get the better of me. He didn't even have time to cry out."

{n}He gulps down air with obvious effort.{/n} "I killed someone. It was not planned, and I had no good reason. A junior officer came to me with some idiotic issue... and I snapped. I let the powers get the better of me. He didn't even have time to cry out."

languages.text: {n}他非常吃力地喘了一口气。{/n}“我杀了人，那并非出于我的本意，我也没有充分的理由那么做。某个下级军官问了一个愚蠢的问题……我的理智崩溃了。我被力量压垮了，他甚至都没来得及叫出声来。”
languages.original_text: {n}He gulps down air with obvious effort.{/n} "I killed someone. It was not planned, and I had no good reason. A junior officer came to me with some idiotic issue... and I snapped. I let the powers get the better of me. He didn't even have time to cry out."

traits.locale_text: {n}他非常吃力地喘了一口气。{/n}“我杀了人，那并非出于我的本意，我也没有充分的理由那么做。某个下级军官问了一个愚蠢的问题……我的理智崩溃了。我被力量压垮了，他甚至都没来得及叫出声来。”

languages.text: {n}Con gran esfuerzo, traga aire.{/n} «He matado a alguien. No de forma premeditada y sin buen motivo. Un oficial joven se me ha acercado con un problema ridículo... y algo en mí se ha roto. He perdido el control de mis poderes. No ha podido ni gritar».
languages.original_text: {n}He gulps down air with obvious effort.{/n} "I killed someone. It was not planned, and I had no good reason. A junior officer came to me with some idiotic issue... and I snapped. I let the powers get the better of me. He didn't even have time to cry out."

traits.locale_text: {n}Con gran esfuerzo, traga aire.{/n} «He matado a alguien. No de forma premeditada y sin buen motivo. Un oficial joven se me ha acercado con un problema ridículo... y algo en mí se ha roto. He perdido el control de mis poderes. No ha podido ni gritar».

languages.text: {n}彼は深呼吸をした。その所作は覚悟を込めたものだった。{/n}「俺は人を殺した。計画的ではなかったし、正当な理由もなかった。下士官がバカげた問題を持ちかけてきて…俺は激昂した。己の力に負けてしまった。彼には泣き叫ぶ暇さえなかった」
languages.original_text: {n}He gulps down air with obvious effort.{/n} "I killed someone. It was not planned, and I had no good reason. A junior officer came to me with some idiotic issue... and I snapped. I let the powers get the better of me. He didn't even have time to cry out."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は深呼吸をした。その所作は覚悟を込めたものだった。{/n}「俺は人を殺した。計画的ではなかったし、正当な理由もなかった。下士官がバカげた問題を持ちかけてきて…俺は激昂した。己の力に負けてしまった。彼には泣き叫ぶ暇さえなかった」

languages.text: {n}Il peine à inspirer.{/n} « J'ai tué quelqu'un. Je n'en avais pas l'intention et je n'avais aucune raison de le faire. Un sous-officier est venu me parler d'un problème ridicule et... j'ai craqué. J'ai laissé mes pouvoirs prendre le dessus. Il n'a même pas eu le temps de crier. »
languages.original_text: {n}He gulps down air with obvious effort.{/n} "I killed someone. It was not planned, and I had no good reason. A junior officer came to me with some idiotic issue... and I snapped. I let the powers get the better of me. He didn't even have time to cry out."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il peine à inspirer.{/n} « J'ai tué quelqu'un. Je n'en avais pas l'intention et je n'avais aucune raison de le faire. Un sous-officier est venu me parler d'un problème ridicule et... j'ai craqué. J'ai laissé mes pouvoirs prendre le dessus. Il n'a même pas eu le temps de crier. »

languages.text: {n}Er ringt augenscheinlich nach Worten.{/n} "Ich habe jemanden getötet. Es war nicht geplant und ich hatte dazu keinen guten Grund. Ein Junior-Offizier kam mit irgendeinem blödsinnigen Problem zu mir ... und ich bin einfach übergeschnappt. Ich habe mich von meinen Kräften überwältigen lassen. Er konnte am Ende nicht mal mehr schreien."
languages.original_text: {n}He gulps down air with obvious effort.{/n} "I killed someone. It was not planned, and I had no good reason. A junior officer came to me with some idiotic issue... and I snapped. I let the powers get the better of me. He didn't even have time to cry out."

Ein Junior-Offizier kam mit irgendeinem blödsinnigen Problem zu mir ... und ich bin einfach übergeschnappt. Ich habe mich von meinen Kräften überwältigen lassen. Er konnte am Ende nicht mal mehr schreien."

languages.text: {n}Aşikâr bir çabayla yutkunarak nefes alıyor.{/n} "Birini öldürdüm. Bunu planlamamıştım, geçerli bir sebebim de yoktu. Kıdemsiz bir subay, aptalca bir sorunla bana geldi ve... Kontrolü kaybettim. Güçlerimin beni alt etmesine izin verdim. Haykırmaya vakit bile bulamadı."
languages.original_text: {n}He gulps down air with obvious effort.{/n} "I killed someone. It was not planned, and I had no good reason. A junior officer came to me with some idiotic issue... and I snapped. I let the powers get the better of me. He didn't even have time to cry out."
